Item.name: NoInit
Item.description: No initialization (start values are used as guess values with fixed=false)

Item.name: SteadyState
Item.description: Steady state initialization (derivatives of states are zero)

Item.name: InitialOutput
Item.description: Initialization with initial outputs (and steady state of the states if possible)

Item.name: DynamicFreeInitial
Item.description: DynamicFreeInitial -- Dynamic balance, Initial guess value

Item.name: FixedInitial
Item.description: FixedInitial -- Dynamic balance, Initial value fixed

Item.name: SteadyStateInitial
Item.description: SteadyStateInitial -- Dynamic balance, Steady state initial with guess value

Item.name: SteadyState
Item.description: SteadyState -- Steady state balance, Initial guess value

Item.name: Bidirectional
Item.description: No restrictions on fluid flow (flow reversal possible)

ScalarVariable.name: system.allowFlowReversal
ScalarVariable.description: = false to restrict to design flow direction (port_a -> port_b)

ScalarVariable.name: system.traceDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Default formulation of trace substance balances

ScalarVariable.name: system.momentumDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Default formulation of momentum balances, if options available

ScalarVariable.name: system.m_flow_start
ScalarVariable.description: Default start value for mass flow rates

ScalarVariable.name: system.use_eps_Re
ScalarVariable.description: = true to determine turbulent region automatically using Reynolds number

ScalarVariable.name: system.eps_m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Regularization of zero flow for |m_flow| < eps_m_flow*m_flow_nominal

ScalarVariable.name: system.dp_small
ScalarVariable.description: Default small pressure drop for regularization of laminar and zero flow

ScalarVariable.name: system.m_flow_small
ScalarVariable.description: Default small mass flow rate for regularization of laminar and zero flow

ScalarVariable.name: bias
ScalarVariable.description: biasing of mass flow rate sensor

ScalarVariable.name: valve.allowFlowReversal
ScalarVariable.description: = true to allow flow reversal, false restricts to design direction (port_a -> port_b)

ScalarVariable.name: valve.port_a.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: valve.port_a.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: valve.port_a.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: valve.port_b.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: valve.port_b.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: valve.port_b.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: valve.dp_start
ScalarVariable.description: Guess value of dp = port_a.p - port_b.p

ScalarVariable.name: valve.m_flow_small
ScalarVariable.description: Small mass flow rate for regularization of zero flow

ScalarVariable.name: valve.show_T
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if temperatures at port_a and port_b are computed

ScalarVariable.name: valve.show_V_flow
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if volume flow rate at inflowing port is computed

ScalarVariable.name: valve.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate in design flow direction

ScalarVariable.name: valve.dp
ScalarVariable.description: Pressure difference between port_a and port_b (= port_a.p - port_b.p)

ScalarVariable.name: valve.V_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Volume flow rate at inflowing port (positive when flow from port_a to port_b)

ScalarVariable.name: valve.port_a_T
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature close to port_a, if show_T = true

ScalarVariable.name: valve.port_b_T
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature close to port_b, if show_T = true

ScalarVariable.name: valve.filteredOpening
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if opening is filtered with a 2nd order CriticalDamping filter

ScalarVariable.name: valve.riseTime
ScalarVariable.description: Rise time of the filter (time to reach 99.6 % of an opening step)

ScalarVariable.name: valve.leakageOpening
ScalarVariable.description: The opening signal is limited by leakageOpening (to improve the numerics)

ScalarVariable.name: valve.Re_turbulent
ScalarVariable.description: cf. straight pipe for fully open valve -- dp_turbulent increases for closing valve

ScalarVariable.name: valve.use_Re
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if turbulent region is defined by Re, otherwise by m_flow_small

ScalarVariable.name: Source.medium.MM
ScalarVariable.description: Molar mass (of mixture or single fluid)

ScalarVariable.name: Source.medium.preferredMediumStates
ScalarVariable.description: = true if StateSelect.prefer shall be used for the independent property variables of the medium

ScalarVariable.name: Source.medium.standardOrderComponents
ScalarVariable.description: If true, and reducedX = true, the last element of X will be computed from the other ones

ScalarVariable.name: Source.ports[1].m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: Source.ports[1].p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: Source.ports[1].h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: Sink.medium.MM
ScalarVariable.description: Molar mass (of mixture or single fluid)

ScalarVariable.name: Sink.medium.preferredMediumStates
ScalarVariable.description: = true if StateSelect.prefer shall be used for the independent property variables of the medium

ScalarVariable.name: Sink.medium.standardOrderComponents
ScalarVariable.description: If true, and reducedX = true, the last element of X will be computed from the other ones

ScalarVariable.name: Sink.ports[1].m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: Sink.ports[1].p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: Sink.ports[1].h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: mFlow.allowFlowReversal
ScalarVariable.description: = true to allow flow reversal, false restricts to design direction (port_a -> port_b)

ScalarVariable.name: mFlow.port_a.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: mFlow.port_a.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: mFlow.port_a.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: mFlow.port_b.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: mFlow.port_b.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: mFlow.port_b.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: mFlow.m_flow_small
ScalarVariable.description: Regularization for bi-directional flow in the region |m_flow| < m_flow_small (m_flow_small > 0 required)

ScalarVariable.name: mFlow.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from port_a to port_b

ScalarVariable.name: heatCapacitor.port.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: fixedTemperature.port.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: command.initType
ScalarVariable.description: Type of initialization (1: no init, 2: steady state, 3,4: initial output)

ScalarVariable.name: command.y_start
ScalarVariable.description: Initial or guess value of output (= state)
